attributes.action: Remove E.U or not visitors once laws are broken.
attributes.additional_details: I believe too many illegal or legal citizens are breaking the law & repeating to commit crime,whether driving or fraud,still it continues.Are we not giving a bad message..come & do as you wish.They arrive here agreeing to follow our laws & if its not-they should be removed,we would if tables are turned.We are sadly seen as a easy touch,gangs of visitors stealing,this will punish with a fine,they have no respect for this country.Im not racist,im proud to be british,once,now it grows worse.Visitors from countries will not take back their citizens if no I.D,passports have been posted home.Crime is here & allowed to occur,if a law is broken then our laws are not respected & followed,so why are they welcomed & housed?
